headline: Assessing Xylem (XYL) Valuation As Analyst Sentiment Improves And Earnings Expectations Strengthen
summary: Recent enthusiasm around Xylem (XYL) is tied to more upbeat analyst coverage and rising earnings estimates, along with expectations for higher revenue and profit in the latest quarter, which has sharpened investor focus on the stock. See our latest analysis for Xylem. Xylem’s recent 2.1% 1 day share price return to US$142.12 and 3.1% 7 day share price return sit against a softer 90 day share price return of 6.1% decline.
